Text: Come on, please start uploading MPGs again.  Re-encoding an xvid video is like re-recording a video that was already taped in EP, you know what I mean?
I switched to XviD because the MPG files are too big and take double the time to upload. Also I have limited hard drive space and the MPG files take up too much room.
Couldn't you just delete your older mpg videos?  Surely you are not still seeding the torrents that you uploaded over a year ago.
Speaking of old torrents, can you re-seed Adam Ant's "Strip" before following this deleting advice?  It's maxed out at about 90%. Thanks
I already delete my older files but I'm adding files that aren't music videos to my hard drive so I'm running out of room.
Guys don't reclaim too much.. Just download and not request more.. You're only leeching and not seeding yourself..
